Game Info

Publisher (s): Frictional Games Developer: Bohemia Interactive Studio Genre / Type: FPS / Simulation Platform: Windows PC Release Date: 09/12/2013 Rating Release: 4/5

Description

ArmA III is a shooter first-person-oriented simulation on PC, putting you in the shoes of Captain Scott Miller. In a relatively futuristic context, the brave captain and some of his men are stranded on a Mediterranean island full of hostile enemies. To you therefore to carry out your goals in these unfavorable conditions. 
Altis Life is a mod Arma3. It adds a PR side to the game (much like the sims). It allows you to play your "own" life on the server. To buy houses, to make trades (legal or not), etc.
